definition: the bone structure that forms the head and surrounds and protects the brain
any of the three very small bones in the middle ear
the third of three small bones in the middle ear that carry sound to the inner ear
the middle joint of an animal’s back leg
a piece of meat from the lower part of an animal’s leg, especially a pig
if something that you own is in hock, you have exchanged it for money but hope to buy it back later
a group of people or things standing very close together
a bone of the finger or toe
one of the small bones in the ankle and upper foot
any of the five bones in the hand between the wrist and the fingers
any of the eight small bones that form the wrist (= part between the hand and the arm)
a vehicle that hangs from and is pulled by a moving cable and that carries passengers up and down a mountain
a vehicle that runs on tracks and is pulled by a moving cable
a person travelling in a canoe
helping you to rest and become less anxious
a mass of very small drops of liquid in the air, for example steam
